location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Grant, Bahrein, to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that the Turks at Kutuf [Qatif] are said to be suffering from fever and that there is also fever at Bahrein.The letter also reports that the Lynnhas not returned to Bahrein and its whereabouts are unknown and that Mr McDougall is still in Bahrein.
